i need help in setting up the conversion tracking for my ad correctly. i am promoting clickbank products

Sure thing! To set up conversion tracking for your ClickBank products on NewsBreak, you'll need to use a Postback integration. Here's a step-by-step guide:
1. **Request Access**: If it's your first time setting up a Postback on ClickBank, request access to the Instant Notification URL by checking 'Yes' for everything and saving the changes.
2. **Set Secret Key and URL**: Enter the 'Edit' view of Advanced Tools in ClickBank and set the Secret Key to MONETIZENEWS and Instant Notification URL to `https://business.newsbreak.com/tracking/clickbank`.
3. **Test IPN**: Make sure you click 'TEST IPN' twice for verification and save the changes.
4. **Create/Test Web Event**: Log into your NewsBreak ad account, go to Event Management, select 'Create/Test Web Event', name your event, choose 'Postback' as your event tracking type, select 'ClickBank' as your 3rd party tracking service, and choose 'sale' as your conversion event.
5. **Test Integration**: Enter the test URL from ClickBank in NewsBreak's testing tool and click 'Go test'. Check back on NewsBreak's page for test results.
Make sure you use the parameter "tid" in your URL to pass through the click ID.
For more detailed instructions, check out this article: [How to set up a ClickBank Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23746617571341-How-to-set-up-a-ClickBank-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if you need further assistance!
ad is connected to my own landing page and then the optin takes then to clickbank product page

Got it! Since you're using your own landing page, it's important to ensure that the Click ID is passed through all redirects to the ClickBank product page. Here's what you need to do:
1. **Pass Click ID**: Make sure that your CTA button on your landing page passes the Click ID to ClickBank. This is crucial for accurate tracking.
2. **Check Redirects**: Double-check that the Click ID is maintained through all redirects from your landing page to the ClickBank product page.
If you follow these steps, you should be able to track conversions accurately. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
how to Pass Click ID: Make sure that your CTA button on your landing page passes the Click ID to ClickBank. This is crucial for accurate tracking.

To pass the Click ID from your landing page to ClickBank, you'll need to ensure that the Click ID is included in the URL parameters when users click on your CTA button. Here's how you can do it:
1. **Modify Your Landing Page URL**: Add the `__CALLBACK_PARAM__` to your landing page URL. This parameter will be replaced with a unique ID when users click on your NewsBreak ad.
   Example:
   ```
   https://your-landing-page.com/?newsbreak_cid=__CALLBACK_PARAM__
   ```
2. **Update Your CTA Button**: Ensure that when users click on the CTA button, this Click ID is passed along in the URL to the ClickBank product page.
3. **Check Redirects**: Make sure that this parameter is maintained through all redirects until it reaches the ClickBank product page.
By following these steps, you should be able to track conversions accurately from your landing page through to ClickBank. If you need more detailed guidance, feel free to ask!
